fields.title: Who Are We?
fields.content: Welcome to Granite Tap, your go-to destination for locally crafted beers from the heart of Aberdeen and Aberdeenshire in Scotland. We take pride in offering a diverse selection of high-quality, locally produced beers that capture the essence of our vibrant community.

fields.title: Our Mission
fields.content: At Granite Tap, our mission is simple: to connect you with the rich and flavourful brews crafted by our local breweries. We believe in supporting the talent and passion of our region's brewers, and we're excited to share their unique creations with beer enthusiasts like you.

fields.title: Explore Local Flavors
fields.content: Discover a variety of beer styles, from hoppy IPAs to rich stouts, each carefully brewed to perfection. Our curated collection showcases the diversity of flavours that make the Aberdeen/Aberdeenshire beer scene truly special. Whether you're a seasoned beer connoisseur or just beginning your craft beer journey, there's something for everyone at Granite Tap.

fields.title: Convenient Home Delivery
fields.content: Sit back, relax, and let us bring the local beer experience to your doorstep. Enjoy the convenience of having your favourite brews delivered straight to your home. With Granite Tap, supporting local breweries has never been easier.

fields.title: Join Us on This Tasting Adventure
fields.content: We invite you to explore our selection, support local breweries, and savour the distinctive taste of Aberdeen/Aberdeenshire beers. Thank you for being a part of our community and sharing in the joy of great beer.

fields.question: What are your delivery options?
fields.answer: We offer standard delivery. Standard delivery takes approximately 3-5 working days.

fields.question: Where do you delivery to?
fields.answer: We offer delivery to UK mainland only.

fields.question: What happens if I'm not home during the delivery?
fields.answer: If you're not home, the courier will leave a delivery card with instructions on how to rearrange delivery or collect your parcel from a local depot.

fields.question: Do you offer international shipping?
fields.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot deliver internationally. We only delivery to UK mainland

fields.question: How are shipping delays communicated?
fields.answer: In the rare event of shipping delays, we will notify you via email or SMS.
